text: 1 Welcome to CSC331 Fall 2025 Data Structures Professor Kevin Byron (kbyron@bmcc.cuny.edu) Department of CIS, Room F-1030-I Office hours: Wed 2pm-5pm (in-person and Zoom) Office phone: 212-220-1490 Borough of Manhattan Community College/CUNY 2 CSC331 Fall 2025 Data Structures Week 1: Review course syllabus Review BMCC semester calendar Brightspace LMS C++ program execution First program assignment Software development overview/review Professor Kevin Byron Department of CIS Borough of Manhattan Community College/CUNY 3 Reminders • No class Mon 9-1-2025, Mon 9-22-2025 thru Wed 9-24-2025 • Program 1 due date – 1159pm Fri 9-19-2025 – late submission receives no credit • Exam 1 – Section 501 Tue 9-30-2025 – Zoom 630pm-730pm – Section 172 Wed 10-8-2025 – In person 1010am-1110am • Closed book, closed notes, no devices – Section 500 Wed 10-8-2025 – In person 630pm-730pm • Closed book, closed notes, no devices • Posted on Brightspace – Faculty information, Course syllabus, program 1 specifications, Malik textbook 2 nd edition, Week 1 lecture slides, sample c++ hello program (dm468.cpp), personType.h header file, sample Prog1 screen capture report 4 Locate and run executable code 1. “hover” over source file name to reveal file location Locate and run executable code 2. In CMD, go to VS project directory & find executable 3.
